channel.title: And one got a unwanted level 3?
channel.description: i donno if this is legal but had any one got a lvl 3 or any other acc they do not need i need cuz i need to advertise my merchant clan

item.title: And one got a unwanted level 3?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.source: And one got a unwanted level 3?

item.title: And one got a unwanted level 3?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Spades, post:12, topic:362868”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=459145.msg3360958#msg3360958 date=1286378025]

You know Jagex made it possible to be skip Tutorial Island. So it is quite easy to make level 3 spammer bots.
[/quote]I thought they removed tutorial island, and made like some gay ques?

They Re-Made Tutorial Island completely and now you are underground in Lumbridge, but there is an option to skip it. There has been overall 3 versions of Tutorial Island, the one we all know of on the actual Tutorial Island, then they made sort of a Beta, that only last a-couple months, which was similar to the one they have now but it was extremely long, you would run around Lumbridge fishing and they even made a new mine by the cow fields that in the Tutorial would collapse which is why it looks the way it does now. Overall, I like the old school Tutorial Island the most, the new one is boring and retarded, at least with the old one you would get to see other players doing it with you.[/quote]Yea, I loved the old tutorial island.

Read full topic
item.source: And one got a unwanted level 3?

item.title: And one got a unwanted level 3?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:11, topic:362868”][quote author=Spades link=topic=459145.msg3360898#msg3360898 date=1286364680]
You know Jagex made it possible to be skip Tutorial Island. So it is quite easy to make level 3 spammer bots.
[/quote]I thought they removed tutorial island, and made like some gay ques?[/quote]

They Re-Made Tutorial Island completely and now you are underground in Lumbridge, but there is an option to skip it. There has been overall 3 versions of Tutorial Island, the one we all know of on the actual Tutorial Island, then they made sort of a Beta, that only last a-couple months, which was similar to the one they have now but it was extremely long, you would run around Lumbridge fishing and they even made a new mine by the cow fields that in the Tutorial would collapse which is why it looks the way it does now. Overall, I like the old school Tutorial Island the most, the new one is boring and retarded, at least with the old one you would get to see other players doing it with you.

Read full topic
item.source: And one got a unwanted level 3?
